job_details.experience_required: 15 years of experience in IT project implementation with at least 5-8 years in SAP projects (end-to-end) implementation.

jd: From: Geetha, Paramount software solutions geetha@paramountsoft.net Reply to: geetha@paramountsoft.net Hi Partners,Role:SAP Functional Project Manager role. Location:Kansas, MO (Hybrid)Duration:12+ Months (Possibility of Extension)Note: The Consultant needs to be ready for need-based traveling every month depending on client needs with prior information from the client site. All the expenses will be covered by the client during the travel. Main Role & Responsibilities: SAP Project Manager Resource will assist in various SAP programs/projects related to technology and service transitions. Manage reporting and resolution of issues, risks, and dependencies, proactively identifying potential planning gaps, implementing mitigations to risks, and driving actions to close issues. · Accountable for the successful delivery of all project phases, releases, and project components for SAP Transformation projects· Responsible for overall quality, engagement, and adherence to the schedule and budget for theproject· Develop and execute end-to-end project management activities.· Define project scope with key stakeholders and effectively manage milestones and dependencies.· Monitor delivery performance and quality using metrics and status reporting.· Mitigate risks as defined in project plan.· Manage all change requests, validate all budget/schedule impacts, obtain the stakeholder’s commitment, and communicate approved changes to all teams.Preferred Requirements· Experience in multiple integration projects· 15 years of experience in IT project implementation with at least 5-8 years in SAP projects (end-to-end) implementation.· 5 years of experience in a managerial role, leading teams to deliver complex; large-scale SAPproject implementation.· Possess strong knowledge and experience in large and complex SAP implementation.· Experience managing ECC to S/4 HANA migration projects· Possess strong business and consulting acumen.· Posses strong stakeholder management (all levels including C-level) with the ability to properly manage stakeholder expectations and escalations.· Possess strong analytical thinking, problem-solving, and team management skills.· Excellent communication skills· Highly collaborative and detail-oriented, self-directed.· PMP Certification preferred; Other PM certifications like CSM, SAFe, and SAP Activate PM also nice to have.
